briefTitle: Growth Retardation In Children With Special Pathological Conditions Or Disease
officialTitle: Evolution Of Growth Rate In Children Suffering From A Disease Associated With Growth Retardation and Treated By Genotonorm. A Pilot Study.
summary: To show an increase in annual growth rate 3 years after Visit 2. Annual growth rate in standard deviation (SD) after 3 years will be compared to growth rate before the start of GH treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Annual Growth Rate Standard Deviation Score (SDS) for Chronological Age (CA) at Month 36 in Intent-to-Treat (ITT) Population
